pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computation and Plots of Influence Functions for Risk and Performance Measures // Computes the influence functions time series of the returns for the risk and performance measures as mentioned in Zhang and Martin (2017) https://ssrn.com/abstract=2747179 as well as Chen and Martin (2018) https://ssrn.com/abstract=3085672. Also evaluates estimators influence functions at a set of parameter values and plots them to display the shapes of the influence functions.
